elements.title: Monika Salzer (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Monika Salzer, a systematic psychotherapist and Protestant pastor, was a columnist for the Kronen Zeitung and appeared on television in Dancing Stars?

elements.title: 2021 U.S. Open Pool Championship (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that all 256 places at the 2021 U.S. Open Pool Championship were filled within 10 hours?

elements.title: Anadolu Shipyard (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Turkey's Anadolu Shipyard signed a contract with India's Hindustan Shipyard to transfer technology for the building of five fleet support ships for the Indian Navy?

elements.title: Lori Gramlich (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Lori Gramlich, a survivor of sexual abuse in her childhood, introduced legislation that made it easier for sexual abuse survivors in Maine to file civil lawsuits against their abusers?

elements.title: The Gods from Outer Space (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that while The Gods from Outer Space has eight volumes, only four were published in English?

elements.title: On a Very Special Episode... (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the crane shots at the end of the opening sequence for the WandaVision episode "On a Very Special Episode..." were added as an homage to Full House?

elements.title: Battle of Kabamba (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that rebel leader and later Ugandan president Yoweri Museveni had to walk 19 kilometres (12 mi) and borrow a car before the Battle of Kabamba because his pickup truck had broken down?

elements.title: Arthur Linz (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that American chemist Arthur Linz specialized in molybdenum, an element with so many uses that it was once described as "ambidextrous, bi-sexual and polygamous"?

elements.title: 40人感染并外溢！150秒看懂黑龙江本轮疫情 (快科技)
elements.contents:
福建、黑龙江两省的疫情形势牵动人心，其中黑龙江省的疫情规模先对不算大，但却出现了波及范围扩大、外溢的情况。
那么，本轮疫情现状如何？何时能得到控制？

elements.title: 小米代言人杨倩工牌曝光！网友直呼太可爱 (快科技)
elements.contents:
在2020东京奥运会女子10米气步枪决赛上，浙江小将杨倩以251.8环的成绩夺得冠军，为中国代表团揽入本届奥运会第一枚金牌。
今日上午，小米宣布，杨倩成为Xiaomi Civi代言人。

elements.title: 东北突然拉闸限电 居民企业措不及防：官方回应 (快科技)
elements.contents: 针对东北多地限电一事，辽宁、吉林均表示，要最大可能避免出现拉闸限电情况。辽宁要求，电网公司要延长有序用电负荷缺口预测时间和预警等级发布时间，扩大告知范围，便于用户提前安排用电计划。

elements.title: 十三香瞬间不香！iPhone14大曝光：外形全变 苹果激进 (快科技)
elements.contents:

elements.title: 生产旺季却搞拉闸限电！咋回事？ (快科技)
elements.contents: “限电停产”成了近日的热点话题。多家上市公司发布公告，为配合地区“能耗双控”要求，将削减水泥、电石、电解铝、螺纹钢等工业原材料产能，而受供给减少影响，多种工业品

elements.title: 多省工厂限电停产！3层办公楼以下停用电梯如何？ (快科技)
elements.contents:
9月22日晚开始，多家上市公司先后发布公告称，由于供电紧张，为响应当地“能耗双控”的要求，公司或旗下子公司的生产线临时停产。

elements.title: 水务公司停电停水通知引众怒 官方回应：严肃处理责任人 (快科技)
elements.contents:
日前吉林水务公司发布停水停电通知，表示要不定期、不定时、无计划、无通知停电限电，这一通知引发网络不满。今天早些时候，吉林水务公司表示严肃对待此事，严格按公司制度处理相关责任人。

elements.title: 为什么平均工资总比感觉中的高？官方解答来了 (快科技)
elements.contents:

elements.title: 突然限电 红绿灯都停了！缺口特别巨大 (快科技)
elements.contents:
9月23日，沈阳市沈北新区、浑南新区部分区域限制供电，甚至导致部分道路的红绿信号灯也没电了，产生严重拥堵。
